name: Paraception
description:
Have you ever wondered what it feels like to be trapped in a house with unspeakable nightmares that you only hear stories about? Well you may or may not experience it in real, but you can definitely experience it in our game! Paraception is a first-person survival horror game that puts you face to face with a serial killer, except he's not alone........

This game is still in development. We'd greatly appreciate it if you could answer a few questions about our game as it will help us immensely in improving Paraception.  We promise it will only take you five minutes!
Link: Paraception feedback form
